briefTitle: Certolizumab Pegol for the Treatment of Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
officialTitle: A Phase IIIb Multicenter Study With a 12-week Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Randomized Period Followed by an Open-label, Extension Phase Evaluating Safety/Efficacy of Certolizumab Pegol Given to Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis.
summary: This is a Phase IIIb multicenter study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of certolizumab pegol (CZP) administered to patients with moderate-to-severe rheumatoid arthritis.

primaryOutcome.measure: American College of Rheumatology 20% (ACR20) Response at Week 12
